org.ietf.nea.pt.socket

Interface SocketWrapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SocketHandler, SocketMessenger
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSocketWrapper

    public interface SocketWrapper
extends SocketHandler, SocketMessenger
    Generic wrapper to encapsulate a socket and mask its functions for the transmission and receipt of TNC messages thru the contained socket and for the management of the contained socket.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.SocketHandler

        close, getRxCounter, getTxCounter, initialize, isOpen, resetCounters

      • Methods inherited from interface org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.SocketMessenger

        createValidationErrorMessage, getIdentifier, readFromStream, writeToStream
